Show objects information and checking for malicious pdf

= Objects Information =

FileInfo automatically *counts objects* to identify *<a href="http://code.google.com/p/fileinfo-gui/wiki/pdf?ts=1304768792&updated=pdf#Malicious_PDF">malicious PDF</a>* documents.
